name: SuperKalam
headline: Personal Tutor for Every Student, powered by AI Learning Ecosystem.
description:
Every student deserve personal attention. It's first time in the history of the planet, that if done right, we can infinitely scale personalised learning experience at scale to every student. That's what we are building at SuperKalam.

We have deployed our AI learning systems in One Test prep category in India, it's already generating $500K ARR.

founders.name: Vimal Singh Rathore, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO, Kalam,
previously bootstrapped coursavy to a multi-million exit,
founding team member & growth leader at unacademy,

founders.name: Aseem Gupta, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CTO at SuperKalam,
previously in early engineering team at razorpay,
have built consumer products grossing $3B+ in transaction volume

## Inspiring Journeys
Improved my Accuracy with MCQsSuperKalam tailors MCQ questions for my weak areas. In 3 weeks, my accuracy rose from 52% to 88%! Seeing my name on the leaderboard boosts my confidence.
![Muskan Priya](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fmuskan.png&w=3840&q=75)
Muskan Priya, UPSC Aspirant 2024
![Improved my Accuracy with MCQs](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fmuskan_journey.png&w=3840&q=75)


Now, I am disciplined and focused!I rely on SuperKalam to clear doubts, learn complex topics, and practice questions. I'm on a 22-day streak üí™. Like a supportive study buddy, SuperKalam nudges me to keep practicing.
![Ashish Suri](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fashish_2.png&w=3840&q=75)
Ashish Suri, UPSC Aspirant 2024
![Now, I am disciplined and focused!](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fashish_journey.png&w=3840&q=75)


Now, I write Mains Answer fasterWriting Mains answers was a hurdle until I used SuperKalam. Instant feedback & model answer helped to improve answer quality, writing speed, reducing time from 30mins to just 8min!‚≠êÔ∏è
![Prachi Kamble](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fprachi.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Prachi Kamble, UPSC Aspirant 2024
![Now, I write Mains Answer faster](https://superkalam.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsuperkalam.com%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Freviews%2Fprachi_journey.png&w=3840&q=75)

generated_description:
### SuperKalam: Your Personal AI-Powered Tutor for UPSC Aspirants

**Overview:**
SuperKalam, founded in 2023 and based in Bengaluru, India, is an innovative educational technology startup that's part of Y Combinator's W23 batch. Its mission is simple yet ambitious: providing every student with a personal tutor through an AI-driven learning ecosystem. 

**Key Insights:**
Imagine a world where every student gets the personal attention they deserve. That‚Äôs the vision SuperKalam is bringing to life. The company leverages cutting-edge AI to create a tailored learning experience‚Äîscalable enough to reach a vast number of students simultaneously. 

**Current Traction:**
SuperKalam has made significant strides in the competitive test prep market in India, notably in the UPSC exam preparation niche. Even at this early stage, it's generating an impressive $500K in annual recurring revenue (ARR), demonstrating strong market validation for its unique approach.

**Team & Mentorship:**
The company currently operates with a dedicated team of 20 employees, backed by Gruftaf Alstromer as a Group Partner from Y Combinator, which adds valuable mentorship and network opportunities.

**Educational Offering:**
SuperKalam's platform is tailored specifically for UPSC aspirants, offering features such as:
- **Instant Doubt Resolution:** Students can clear their concepts with the help of personal mentors.
- **Unlimited MCQ Practice:** Designed to help students master their weak areas.
- **Mains Evaluation:** Provides quick feedback to improve writing speed and quality.
- **Daily Leaderboards and Progress Tracking:** Encourages healthy competition among peers and helps students set and achieve daily learning goals.

**Student Testimonials:**
Users have described SuperKalam as a game-changer in their preparation journeys. One student reported significantly improving their accuracy with MCQs, while another highlighted how the platform‚Äôs feedback loop reduced their answer-writing time drastically from 30 minutes to just 8. The sense of community, with over 35,000 aspirants, provides peer support that's invaluable during the often solitary journey of exam prep.

**Pricing Model:**
To make premium education accessible, SuperKalam offers an annual plan at just ‚Çπ8/day, making it an attractive option for students seeking to enhance their learning without breaking the bank.

**Why It Matters:**
What sets SuperKalam apart is not just its robust AI-driven platform but the underlying philosophy: every student deserves personalized attention. In a system where traditional methods often fall short, SuperKalam is pioneering a path to redefine educational access, particularly in the competitive landscape of UPSC preparations.

**Connect and Explore:**
You can explore their offerings and see if SuperKalam is a fit for your learning journey on their website: [SuperKalam.com](https://superkalam.com).

In short, SuperKalam is more than just a prep platform; it‚Äôs a movement towards a future where personalized education is the norm, not the exception.
